resources.string:
Introducing Flightboard

An update to our current confirmation process to help optimize communication and insight between you and Buyers.

What\'s included:
  • At 6am you will receive a notification to confirm your work for tomorrow by noon.
  • Before leaving to the site, you can now mark a work order as on my way, informing the Buyer of your location.
  • You can now inform the Buyer that you are running late and when they should be expecting you.
For all the details, please visit: Learn more about Flightboard

Note:
To take advantage of this process update and potentially avoid calls from a dispatcher, we highly encourage you to enable GPS while using the Field Nation App. Your location will only be shared with a Buyer when you hit "On My Way" and will stop once you tap "Check In".

• Fixed crashes caused by rotating the phone while uploading photos
  • Fixed app getting stuck in retry loop while downloading files
  • Bullet points now show up in work order descriptions

• New look and feel
  • More work order search options
